CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Shadowfen Spectres relative to Azure Armada?
SRP.A: Shadowfen Spectres is {below} Azure Armada in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Azure Armada relative to Ironwood Invincibles?
SRP.A: Azure Armada is {below} Ironwood Invincibles in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverleaf Sentinels relative to Veridian Vipers?
SRP.A: Silverleaf Sentinels is {below} Veridian Vipers in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total sponsorship revenue?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Veridian Vipers}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total sponsorship revenue?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Shadowfen Spectres}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Silverleaf Sentinels's minimum Sponsorship Revenue in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Silverleaf Sentinels's minimum Sponsorship Revenue is in {1997}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Ironwood Invincibles's maximum Sponsorship Revenue in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Ironwood Invincibles's maximum Sponsorship Revenue is in {2010}.

NC.Q: Between 1996 and 2011, was the average total Sponsorship Revenue higher or lower than between 1995 and 1996?
NC.A: The average total sponsorship revenue between 1996 and 2011 was {higher} than between 1995 and 1996.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2011, did the total Sponsorship Revenue experience a larger or smaller change than between 2006 and 2017?
NC.A: The change in total sponsorship revenue between 1999 and 2011 was {larger} than between 2006 and 2017.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2005, did the total Sponsorship Revenue experience a larger or smaller change than between 2003 and 2016?
NC.A: The change in total sponsorship revenue between 2000 and 2005 was {larger} than between 2003 and 2016.

NC.Q: Was the total Sponsorship Revenue in 1998 higher or lower than in 2007?
NC.A: The total sponsorship revenue in 1998 was {lower} than in 2007.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Veridian Vipers} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Azure Armada and Ironwood Invincibles first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Azure Armada and Ironwood Invincibles first exchanged leading positions in {1997}.
